description: Answer these questions about the movies of the 1970's.

questions.question: What musical group recorded six of the songs on the "Saturday Night Fever" soundtrack?

Who was Harold's much much older girlfriend?

who was planning to go to Tosche Station to pick up some power converters

questions.question: The knights who say "Ni"
